application_header: APPLICATION UNDER THE RIGHT TO INFORMATION ACT, 2005

sections.subject: Subject: Request for Information under Section 6 of the Right to Information Act, 2005
sections.applicant_info: I, {applicant_name}, resident of {applicant_address}, hereby request the following information under the Right to Information Act, 2005:
sections.bpl_clause: I am a Below Poverty Line (BPL) cardholder (BPL Card No: {bpl_card_no}) and am therefore exempt from paying the application fee as per Section 7(5) of the RTI Act, 2005.
sections.fee_clause: I am enclosing an application fee of Rs. 10/- (Rupees Ten Only) as required under the RTI Act, 2005.
sections.time_period: The information sought pertains to the period: {time_period}
sections.closing:
I request that the above information be provided to me within 30 days as stipulated under Section 7(1) of the Right to Information Act, 2005.

If the information requested is not available with your office, I request that the application be transferred to the concerned Public Authority under Section 6(3) of the RTI Act, 2005.
sections.declaration: I hereby declare that I am a citizen of India.
